name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Richard ROBICHAW, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Richard ROBICHAW, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NIX, C.J., and ZAPPALA, J., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John W. Packel, Chief/Appeal Div., Karl Baker, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ronald Eisenberg, Chief/Appeals Div., Frances Gerson, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
508 A.2d 1195
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Richard ROBICHAW, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 17, 1986.
Decided April 29, 1986.
John W. Packel, Chief/Appeal Div., Karl Baker, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ronald Eisenberg, Chief/Appeals Div., Frances Gerson, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
